verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David בְּךָ֖ be-Cha יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh In thee O LORD חָ֭סִיתִי <WH2620> Cha-si-ti do I put my trust אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay אֵב֣וֹשָׁה <WH954> e-Voo-shah be ashamed לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; In בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> be-tzid-ka-te-Cha me in thy righteousness פַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <WH6403> fal-le-Te-ni. deliver

אָגִ֥ילָה <WH1523> 'a-Gi-lah I will be glad וְאֶשְׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8055> ve-'es-me-Chah, and rejoice בְּחַ֫סְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH2617> be-Chas-De-cha in thy mercy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Because רָ֭אִיתָ <WH7200> Ra-'i-ta for thou hast considered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָנְיִ֑י <WH6040> 'a-ne-Yi; my trouble יָ֝דַ֗עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da'-ta, thou hast known בְּצָר֥וֹת <WH6869> be-tza-Rot in adversities נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not הִ֭סְגַּרְתַּנִי <WH5462> His-gar-ta-ni And hast not shut me up בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- into the hand אוֹיֵ֑ב <WH341> o-Yev; of the enemy הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתָּ <WH5975> he-'e-Mad-ta thou hast set בַמֶּרְחָ֣ב <WH4800> vam-mer-Chav in a large room רַגְלָֽי׃ <WH7272> rag-Lai. my feet

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for כָל֪וּ <WH3615> cha-Lu is spent בְיָג֡וֹן <WH3015> ve-ya-Gon with grief חַיַּי֮ <WH2416> chai-Yai For my life וּשְׁנוֹתַ֪י <WH8141> u-she-no-Tai and my years בַּאֲנָ֫חָ֥ה <WH585> ba-'a-Na-Chah with sighing כָּשַׁ֣ל <WH3782> ka-Shal faileth בַּעֲוֹנִ֣י <WH5771> ba-'a-vo-Ni because of mine iniquity כֹחִ֑י <WH3581> cho-Chi; my strength וַעֲצָמַ֥י <WH6106> va-'a-tza-Mai and my bones עָשֵֽׁשׁוּ׃ <WH6244> 'a-She-shu. are consumed

מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol of all צֹרְרַ֨י <WH6887> tzo-re-Rai among all mine enemies הָיִ֪יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have become חֶרְפָּ֡ה <WH2781> cher-Pah I was a reproach וְלִשֲׁכֵנַ֨י׀ <WH7934> ve-li-sha-che-Nai among my neighbours מְאֹד֮ <WH3966> me-'Od but especially וּפַ֪חַד <WH6343> u-Fa-chad and a fear לִֽמְיֻדָּ֫עָ֥י <WH3045> lim-yud-Da-'Ai to mine acquaintance רֹאַ֥י <WH7200> ro-'Ai they that did see בַּח֑וּץ <WH2351> ba-Chutz; me without נָדְד֥וּ <WH5074> na-de-Du fled מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. Because

נִ֭שְׁכַּחְתִּי <WH7911> Nish-kach-ti I am forgotten כְּמֵ֣ת <WH4191> ke-Met as a dead man מִלֵּ֑ב <WH3820> mil-Lev; out of mind הָ֝יִ֗יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti, I am כִּכְלִ֥י <WH3627> kich-Li vessel אֹבֵֽד׃ <WH6> 'o-Ved. I am like a broken

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for שָׁמַ֨עְתִּי׀ <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti For I have heard דִּבַּ֥ת <WH1681> dib-Bat the slander רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> rab-Bim of many מָג֪וֹר <WH4032> ma-Gor fear מִסָּ֫בִ֥יב <WH5439> mis-Sa-Viv [was] on every side בְּהִוָּסְדָ֣ם <WH3245> be-hiv-va-se-Dam while they took counsel יַ֣חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad together עָלַ֑י <WH5921> 'a-Lai; against לָקַ֖חַת <WH3947> la-Ka-chat to take away נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> naf-Shi my life זָמָֽמוּ׃ <WH2161> za-Ma-mu. against me they devised

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha and בָטַ֣חְתִּי <WH982> va-Tach-ti But I trusted יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in thee O LORD אָ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, I said אֱלֹהַ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai Thou [art] my God אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> 'At-tah. you

בְּיָדְךָ֥ <WH3027> be-ya-de-Cha [are] in thy hand עִתֹּתָ֑י <WH6256> 'it-to-Tai; My times הַצִּ֘ילֵ֤נִי <WH5337> hatz-Tzi-Le-ni deliver מִיַּד־ <WH3027> mi-yad- me from the hand א֝וֹיְבַ֗י <WH341> 'oy-Vai, of mine enemies וּמֵרֹדְפָֽי׃ <WH7291> u-me-ro-de-Fai. and from them that persecute

הָאִ֣ירָה <WH215> ha-'I-rah to shine פָ֭נֶיךָ <WH6440> Fa-nei-cha Make thy face עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> 'av-De-cha; upon thy servant ה֖וֹשִׁיעֵ֣נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni save בְחַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> ve-chas-De-cha. me for thy mercies'

תֵּ֥אָלַ֗מְנָה <WH481> te-'a-Lam-nah, be put to silence שִׂפְתֵ֫י <WH8193> sif-Tei lips שָׁ֥קֶר <WH8267> Sha-ker Let the lying הַדֹּבְר֖וֹת <WH1696> had-doe-Rot which speak עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik against the righteous עָתָ֗ק <WH6277> 'a-Tak, grievous בְּגַאֲוָ֥ה <WH1346> be-ga-'a-Vah things proudly וָבֽוּז׃ <WH937> va-Vuz. and contemptuously

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אָ֘מַ֤רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti For I said בְחָפְזִ֗י <WH2648> ve-cha-fe-Zi, in my haste נִגְרַזְתִּי֮ <WH1629> nig-raz-Ti I am cut off מִנֶּ֪גֶד <WH5048> min-Ne-ged from before עֵ֫ינֶ֥יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha thine eyes אָכֵ֗ן <WH403> 'a-Chen, nevertheless שָׁ֭מַעְתָּ <WH8085> ma'-ta thou heardest ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice תַּחֲנוּנַ֗י <WH8469> ta-cha-nu-Nai, of my supplications בְּשַׁוְּעִ֥י <WH7768> be-shav-ve-'I when I cried אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about
